item.title: LouderVoice SEO Add-On Now Available for Expression Engine
item.description: Many of our clients on PHP platforms like WordPress, Joomla, Drupal have long benefited from our SEO Add-On. All of our Packages provide Google Juice and Star Ratings in Search results to client sites via our review Hub, LouderYou. The advantage of this approach is ease of deployment. Our code can be added in seconds to a web-page and reviews are then live. Those reviews are indexed on our hub within hours.
